description: A delicious pizza that is topped with tons of veggies with a taco twist!
name: Southwest Veggie Taco Pizza
recipeIngredient: 3/4 cup taco sauce, or more if desired
Optional garnishes: cilantro, jalapeno, avocado, etc.

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat oven to 400 degrees F. Open the Nourish Bowl and squeeze in the chipotle salsa. Stir until combined and then microwave for 3 minutes, or sauté in a pan for about 5 minutes.
Evenly spread the taco sauce on the pizza crust and then top with a handful of cheese. Next, top with the vegetable mixture and then add an extra sprinkle of cheese on the top.
Bake pizza until cheese is melted and crust is crispy on the bottom, 10-15 mins.
Slice and garnish, if desired. Enjoy!

video.description: This Southwest Veggie Taco Pizza is piled high with veggies making it  great for a healthy vegetarian dinner!  Sponsored by Mann's!
video.name: Southwest Veggie Taco Pizza
